auto_onboarding.title: Automatic Onboarding
auto_onboarding.description: Streamlined setup for users with professional email domains. The system automatically groups users from the same company.

step1.label: User Login
step1.description: User authenticates via email/password or OAuth provider.

step2.label: Domain Analysis
step2.description: System parses the email domain. Public domains (gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.) are flagged for Manual Setup.

step3.label: Tenant Discovery
step3.description: For professional domains, the system checks if a tenant already exists for this domain (e.g., @acme).

step4.label: Join or Create
step4.description: If the tenant exists, the user is added as a MEMBER. If not, a new tenant is created with the user as OWNER.

step5.label: Redirection
step5.description: User is automatically redirected to the tenant dashboard.

manual_setup.title: Manual Setup
manual_setup.description: Standard flow for personal email users or creating additional workspaces.

step1.label: Initiation
step1.description: User lands on the tenant selection screen or clicks 'Create Workspace'.

step3.label: Validation
step3.description: System validates character requirements and checks for availability of the Slug and Subdomain.

step4.label: Provisioning
step4.description: New tenant resource is provisioned in the database with the current user assigned as OWNER.

step5.label: Access
step5.description: User is redirected to the newly created workspace.

available_modules.title: Platform Core
available_modules.description: Essential dashboard, settings, and workspace management features.

available_modules.title: Employees (HR)
available_modules.description: Complete HR management with employee directory, profiles, role-based permissions, and advanced dashboard statistics.

available_modules.title: Store Front
available_modules.description: Digital storefront capabilities for selling products or services.

available_modules.title: Customers (CRM)
available_modules.description: Customer relationship management to track leads and client interactions.

add_module_flow.title: Enabling Modules
add_module_flow.description: Process for workspace owners to activate additional functionality.

step1.label: Access Settings
step1.description: Navigate to 'Plan Settings' (/dashboard/plan) from the main sidebar.

step2.label: Browse Marketplace
step2.description: View list of available modules with descriptions.

step3.label: Activation
step3.description: Toggle the switch for the desired module (e.g., HR, CRM). restricted to OWNER role.

step4.label: System Update
step4.description: The application instantly updates permissions and sidebar navigation to include the new module features.
